医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
跨种群的卵巢癌突变显示出相似性和独特的差异由犹他大学亨斯曼癌症研究所（U）和埃默里大学（University）的研究人员领导的卵巢癌个体的广泛肿瘤基因组分析表明，黑人妇女与其他先前研究的人群几乎具有相同的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/ovarian-cancer-mutations-across-populations-show-show-simerities-indimerities-and-nique-differences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/ovarian-cancer-mutations-materations-across-populations-show-show-simeriation-simurilities-and-nique-differences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e07503f-1ec3-4419-be555555555-900ddaffa2b1 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:48:00 -0400 Ovarian cancer mutations across populations show similarities and unique differences
新测试可以预测癌症免疫疗法的生命副作用日本的医学研究人员发现了一种预测癌症免疫疗法潜在威胁生命的副作用的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-test-could-predict-life-tife-life-tive-side-side-side-effects-of-cancer-mmunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-test-could-predict-life-tife-life-tife-side-side-side-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A1FDC59A-E396-4C86-9BFB-202BE1A79425 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:39:00 -0400 New test could predict life-threatening side effects of cancer immunotherapy
三分之一的年轻人估计患有小儿发病新研究表明，在过去的二十年中，慢性病的患病率已上升至前所未有的水平，估计有近3名年轻人现在患有严重影响其生活的儿科发作状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/One-in-three-young-people-estimated-to-live-with-pediatric-onset-chronic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/One-in-three-young-people-estimated-to-live-with-pediatric-onset-chronic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=353b1d5a-c9b5-4ced-9385-582197051076 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:35:00 -0400 One in three young people estimated to live with pediatric onset chronic conditions
新研究检查了婴儿应激反应性产前压力的时间密歇根州立大学和密歇根大学的一组研究人员发现了有关产前压力时间及其对婴儿压力反应性和气质的影响的新见解，包括性别之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-study-examines-timing-fiming-fiming-finatal-prenatal-stress-on-on-infant-nfant surspers-reactivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-study-examines-timing-fiming-fiming-fenatal-natal-natal-natal-nfant-on-infant-nfant-infant-infant-infant-infant-surseactivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9aef1e4-e1de-4CF8-964C-9745AA012158 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:31:00 -0400 New study examines timing of prenatal stress on infant stress reactivity
吃入侵物种和遗忘的农作物可以促进欧洲的粮食安全吗？欧洲的研究人员提出，新食品（NF），未充分利用的农作物（NUS）和入侵物种（IAS）多样化饮食，以打击生物多样性丧失和食物不安全感，平衡生态益处与监管障碍和消费者持怀疑态度等风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/can-eating-invasive-species-and-species-and-forpott-crops-crops-boost-europes-europes-food-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/can-eating-invasive-species-and-species-and-forpott-crops-crops-boost-europes-europes-food-food-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8Acae071-e1ce-4614-AF6A-AF6A-D122222295388 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:31:00 -0400 Can eating invasive species and forgotten crops boost Europe's food security?
青少年出生与婴儿较低的出生体重有关在山状态的青少年数量仍然高于全国平均水平的时候，西弗吉尼亚大学的母亲和儿童健康研究人员发现，与成人相比，这些婴儿的出生体重较低，胎龄较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/teen-births-linked-to-lown-to-lower-infant-nfant-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/teen-births-linked-to-lower-news-lower-infant-birth-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9f1796f-e31b-4c0d-8e16-e16-e16-e16-e54032357d5 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:29:00 -0400 Teen births linked to lower infant birth weight
富含血小板的血浆可以增强卵巢恢复活力并改善女性的鸡蛋质量一份新的研究论文发表在2025年2月18日，第17卷，第2期，标题为“来自<38岁的患者的Cumulus细胞的转录组景观，患有较差的卵巢反应病史（POR），用富含血小板的血浆（PRP）治疗的病史”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/platelet-rich-plasma-may-enhance-enhance-evarian-rejuvarian--rejuvenation-and-ing----------- improve-egg-egg-egger-eggal-egly-cemality-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/platelet-rich-plasma-may-enhance-enhance-evarian-rejuvarian-rejuvenation-and-ing----------- improve-egg-egg egg-eggity-in-pripation-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57e1fed1-18CF-4759-9C5A-90816CE1540A Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:22:05 -0400 Platelet-rich plasma may enhance ovarian rejuvenation and improve egg quality in women
爱泼斯坦 - 巴尔病毒抗体和与MS风险增加有关的基因的组合在多发性硬化症（MS）中，对常见的爱泼斯坦 - 巴尔病毒的抗体会意外攻击大脑和脊髓中的蛋白质。新研究表明，某些病毒抗体和遗传危险因素的结合可以与MS的风险大大增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/combination-of--epstein-barr-virus-virus-antibodies-and-genes-and-genes-clink--genes-clink--------链接到增长 - 危险 - 危险 - 危险https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/combination-oc--epstein-barr-virus-virus-antibodies-and-genes-and-genes-clink- con----互联到添加的危险 - 危险 - 危险 - ms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac1af0df-ab1a-4686-8b26-8055087fc0e0 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:14:00 -0400 Combination of Epstein-Barr virus antibodies and genes linked to increased risk of MS
迷迭香中发现的化合物显示了对阿尔茨海默氏症治疗的希望在莎士比亚的小村庄（Hamlet）中说：“赫伯迷迭香长期以来一直与记忆有关：“有迷迭香，那是为了纪念。”因此，研究人员将研究一种在迷迭香和鼠尾草carnosic酸中发现的化合物对阿尔茨海默氏病的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/compound-found-in-rosemary-shows-promise-for-for-alzheimers-wareatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/compound-found-found-in-rosemary-shows-promise-promise-for-alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5Eded8032d-eaa0-400e-9dde-5153dbdd197e Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:09:00 -0400 Compound found in rosemary shows promise for Alzheimer's treatment
民意调查表明，许多父母对鸟类流感信息和风险不确定。全国民意调查表明，随着鸡蛋价格高涨和持续的鸟流感头条，许多父母不确定该病毒周围的风险和事实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/many-parents-parents-uncnent-birt-birt-bird-flu-information-anderforation-and-lisks-poll-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/many-parents-parents-uncnerty-uncnate-about-birt-flu-influ-information-and-flu-information-and-clisks-poll-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BD40D947-E07E-416B-A9CF-942BC3B17820 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:05:32 -0400 Many parents uncertain about bird flu information and risks, poll suggests
